title: Client update
body:
Hello! So I have been trying to update to the latest patch, and I have been stuck on 78% for over 3 hours :/ just wondering if there is a solution to this.

Thanks!

replies.body: At this percent during your update, the patcher is trying to download updates from our patching servers but your connection  is causing it to backtrack or fail.  Let it keep going and finish up unless you run into any errors.  When finished, run through our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to help troubleshoot this!  Let me know if you have any questions!
